statements: SELECT card_number, card_holder, expiration_date, cvv FROM credit_card_info;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info WHERE card_holder = 'John Smith';
SELECT card_holder, card_number FROM credit_card_info WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT card_holder FROM credit_card_info ORDER BY card_holder ASC;
SELECT card_holder, card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_card_info WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info WHERE card_number = '1234567891234567';
SELECT card_holder, expiration_date FROM credit_card_info WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT card_holder, cvv FROM credit_card_info WHERE card_holder LIKE '%John%';
SELECT card_number, cvv FROM credit_card_info WHERE cvv IN ('123', '456');
SELECT * FROM credit_card_info ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, cardholder_name, card_number FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM credit_cards ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions;
SELECT card_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY card_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date < NOW();
SELECT cardholder_name, card_number FROM credit_cards WHERE id = 'd047c797-8edd-4383-944f-ffa73b770b1d';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE status IN ('approved', 'pending') AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, card_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE status = 'approved' AND amount <= 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards;
SELECT id, encrypted_data FROM credit_cards WHERE id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT amount, transaction_date, card_id FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, card_number, expiration_date FROM credit_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000.00 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT cc.card_number, t.amount, t.transaction_date, c.customer_name FROM credit_cards cc JOIN transactions t ON cc.id = t.card_id JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.id WHERE t.amount < 500.00 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, c.email, cc.card_number, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM customers c JOIN transactions t ON c.id = t.customer_id JOIN credit_cards cc ON t.card_id = cc.id WHERE c.email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' ORDER BY t.amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, credit_card_number FROM customers WHERE credit_card_expiry > '2022-09-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, transactions.amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action LIKE '%update%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, credit_card_number FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customers.name, transactions.amount, transactions.transaction_date FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.id = transactions.customer_id
SELECT customers.name, audit_logs.action, audit_logs.timestamp FROM customers JOIN audit_logs ON customers.id = audit_logs.log_id
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInfo;
SELECT cardholder_name, expiration_date FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE credit_card_number = 1234567890;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM Customer ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE is_admin = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM CreditCardInfo WHERE cardholder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT credit_card_number, MAX(amount) AS largest_amount FROM Transaction GROUP BY credit_card_number;
SELECT * FROM EncryptionKey WHERE encryption_alg = 'AES';
SELECT user_id, username FROM User WHERE is_admin = true;
